attributes.action: stop public schools from using Al Halal meat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The RSPSA, the Veterinary association and even the government all agree that the Al Halal method of slaughter causes unnecessary suffering. Public schools should not be in the business of promoting religious beliefs which breach animals rights and welfare.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
